alert.note: Alert for Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:54PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Dale County through 630 PM CDT... At 553 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ozark, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Enterprise, Level Plains, Newton, Hunt Field, Waterford, Dean Church Road, Hooper Stage Field, Knox Field, Gerald, Lowe Army Heliport, Dale County Lake, Marley Hill, Blackwell Field A/p, Hanchey Field, Klondyke Hill and Dillard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
